scenario.send: INVITE sip:10086@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE From: 8888 <sip:8888@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: 10086 <sip:10086@[remote_ip]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:8888@[local_ip]:[local_port]> User-Agent: SIPp Client Content-Disposition: session Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
